name: .EDM File Extension
type_name: Adobe Extension Data Markup Language File
summary: Learn about .EDM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Settings file used by Adobe Dreamweaver, a program used to create websites; contains user-defined instructions for how to display and populate data within the application; commonly used for developing custom server behaviors.

content: Extension Data Markup Language files more often use the .EDML extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
